TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void FormsAuthenticationEventHandler(object sender, FormsAuthenticationEventArgs e);
.class public auto ansi sealed FormsAuthenticationEventHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Sub FormsAuthenticationEventHandler(sender As Object, e As FormsAuthenticationEventArgs)
public delegate void FormsAuthenticationEventHandler(System::Object ^ sender, FormsAuthenticationEventArgs ^ e);

span.span: A that contains the event data.

summary.span: 表示处理 的 **FormsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** 事件的方法。

span.span: Represents the method that handles the **FormsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** event of a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 委托定义为事件类。The delegate is defined for the event of the class. 你可以访问事件类通过指定一个名为子例程**FormsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** ASP.NET 应用程序的 Global.asax 文件中。You can access the event of the class by specifying a subroutine named **FormsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** in the Global.asax file for your ASP.NET application. 期间引发事件事件。The event is raised during the event. 构造对象使用当前和将其传递给**FormsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate**事件。The constructs a object using the current and passes it to the **FormsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** event. 你可以使用属性对象提供给**FormsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate**事件设置属性的当前向自定义对象。You can use the property of the object supplied to the **FormsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** event to set the property of the current to a custom object. 如果未指定的值期间属性**FormsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate**使用事件、 窗体身份验证票证的 cookie 或 URL 中提供的标识。If you do not specify a value for the property during the **FormsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** event, the identity supplied by the forms authentication ticket in the cookie or URL is used. **FormsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate**事件才会引发时身份验证设置为和是应用程序的活动 HTTP 模块。The **FormsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** event is only raised when the authentication is set to and the is an active HTTP module for the application. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用**FormsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate**事件设置属性的当前到具有自定义对象。The following code example uses the **FormsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** event to set the property of the current to a object with a custom . [!code-csharp[System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule/CS/global.asax#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule/VB/global.asax#1)]
